name: bmc-compuware-topaz-utilities-plugin
description: This plugin provides access to various BMC Compuware Topaz (R) utilities, such as submitting Jobs on the mainframe.
author: BMC Software

inputs.name: connectionId
inputs.label: Host Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the host connection to use to submit a measurement.Host connections can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: credentialId
inputs.label: Azure Vault Secret Name(to retrieve Password)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Vault Secret Name(to retrieve Password used for host connections)

inputs.name: maxConditionCode
inputs.label: Maximum condition code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter a maximum condition code where the submitting of JCL jobs will terminate if any job's return code is greater than the maximum condition code.

inputs.name: windowsTopazWorkbenchCliHome
inputs.label: Windows Topaz Workbench CLI Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the path of installed Topaz Workbench CLI. This can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: linuxTopazWorkbenchCliHome
inputs.label: Linux Topaz Workbench CLI Home
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the path of installed Topaz Workbench CLI. This can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: jclFormat
inputs.label: Select JCL Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: This field specifies the path of installed Topaz Workbench CLI. This can be configured in the Common Configuration Extension.

inputs.name: DatasetMember
inputs.label: Dataset(member)
inputs.helpMarkDown: List JCL dataset(member)s, each on a separate line.
